question: Who among the following authors wrote "Tarikh-i-Shershahi"?
explanation: Abbas Khan Sherwani was the court historian of Shershah Suri and also adorned Mughal emperor Akbar\'s royal court. On theÂ  orders of Mughal emperor Akbar, he wrote Tarikh-i- Shershahi (or Tuhfut-i-Akbarshahi) that deals with the descriptions from 1539 AD to 1555 AD.
